item.title: Military parade celebrates Army's 250th with tanks, troops and aircraft gracing nation's capital
item.description: Cheers and chants rang out Saturday from a crowd of thousands as soldiers manned modern and historic tanks and aircraft for the Army's 250th anniversa...

item.title: WATCH: President Trump arrives on stage for military parade
item.description: The grand military parade that President Trump had been wanting for eight years kicked off Saturday with tanks, troops and a 21-gun salute.

item.title: Military parade hits the streets of Washington with tanks, troops and 21-gun salute
item.description: The grand military parade that President Donald Trump had been wanting for years barreled down Constitution Avenue on Saturday with tanks, troops and ...

item.title: Trump and Putin discuss Iran-Israel fight in Saturday phone call
item.description: President Trump said he talked by phone to Russian President Vladimir Putin about Iran on Saturday, hours before the Iranians began firing a new round...

item.title: Soldiers come from all over for Army's 250th in D.C.
item.description: Army soldiers from near and far traveled Saturday to their military branch's 250th anniversary celebration in the nation's capital.
